tvdb: Lucy finds an ailing Ian, who insists she leave before he hurts her. Realizing what he's become, Lucy asks him to trust her so Ian shows her his fangs. Tess tells Kevin that Livvie didn't die- she's inside her. Tess tries to heal Kevin's anger by putting her hand on his heart, but he pushes her away and accidentally knocks her into the harbor. Caleb denies Rafe's charges that Caleb's responsible for making Alison think she & Rafe are related. Rafe reminds Caleb through visions how Livvie's betrayed him, then Caleb shows Rafe a vision where he bites Ali. Caleb disappears, then reappears behind Rafe, snapping his neck.
